alreadySubscribed.title: Forgetting something?
alreadySubscribed.Message: It looks like you've already subscribed with that email address.

tooManyAttempts.title: Whoa, slow down there
tooManyAttempts.message: You've attempted to subscribe with that email too many times. If you're having trouble, contact us on Twitter.

success.title: Awesome!
success.message: Thanks for subscribing. Check your inbox for a confirmation email.
